div.head: Anxiety/fear (that?) brings out red
div.ab: Take as much as two walnuts(?) aluma bronzida(?), to rub it small(?), and put it in a glass and take the glass, half with light brown water and put in it as much as a walnut of ground salt, and beat(?) it all fully together. And take the place where you have spots(?) and wash it very fully, so will the fear/anxiety go away. And if it doesn't entirely go away the first time, do it two or three times. So will it go away, certainly, and let it dry every time , do it again(?). So it is certain, and certain.
